name: Mine any block safely
goal: Collect targeted blocks while adapting to available tools and hazards
environment: Track nearby ore veins, exposed caves, and mob spawns
Use water to neutralize lava if available

steps.title: Confirm tool and block requirements
steps.details: Check current tool tier vs. target block (e.g., iron pickaxe for diamonds). List nearby blocks and entities to avoid surprises.

steps.title: Stabilize workspace
steps.details: Place torches or temporary blocks to prevent mob spawns and falling gravel/sand. Block off open cave mouths if needed.

steps.title: Mine and collect
steps.details: Dig the target block while standing on solid footing. Use water on lava, and mine around valuable ore to check for hazards before breaking it.

notes: Always carry spare blocks to plug lava and build stairs back up.
